about: This data refers to Equipment Sets in Shadow Fight 3

common.description: These are the easiest type of sets to be collected. There are a total of 21 Common Sets. Collecting all the items of a Common Set will only reward the players with a small amount of coins, 50 stability points in June's Plane, 30 stability points for each item and 30 stability points for a set in Itu's Plane.

rare.description: There are a total of 21 Rare Sets. Collecting all the items of a Rare Set will reward the players with 75 shadow energy, 100 stability points in June's Plane, 60 stability points for each item and 60 stability points for a set in Itu's Plane.

epic.description: There are a total of 21 Epic Sets. Collecting all the items of an Epic Set will reward the players with some coins, 150 shadow energy, 150 stability points in June's Plane, 90 stability points for each item and 90 stability points for a set in Itu's Plane. Aside from the usual methods, some Epic items are also obtainable from certain events.

unique.description: As their rarity name suggests, these sets are more unique than the other four rarities in the sense that they are time-limited sets. Unique equipment has a special theme and can only be obtained while their respective events are ongoing. There are a total of 10 Unique Sets, 4 of which come with a set bonus usable in fights. Collecting all the items of an Unique Set will reward the players with 50 gems and 150 stability points. As of the update 1.32.1, the rarity's power is equivalent to the Legendary sets. Similar to the legendary sets with bonuses, it can now be upgraded and improved.

setInfo.name: Festival King
setInfo.ability: Taking a sip from a mysterious flask will give you a random blessing from the Monkey King

setInfo.name: Spring Champion
setInfo.ability: You receive shadow energy from other creatures, tap into rare Bloom energy and use it for festival tricks

setInfo.name: Immortal Lord
setInfo.ability: The Power of Rot allows you to inflict Bleeding, steal health, and return to life after receiving lethal damage

sets.event: Winter Frenzy, Jewels of the North, Winter Festival or other Christmas and New Year events

setInfo.name: Brilliant Fakir
setInfo.ability: You can exhale fire, weakening your opponent

setInfo.name: Best Specialist
setInfo.ability: You start the round in shadow form and gain powerful shadow abilities

setInfo.name: Legitimate Authority
setInfo.ability: By landing successful attacks without taking damage, you collect Symbol of Authority, that allow you to land powerful and critical hits to your opponent

setInfo.name: Liberator
setInfo.ability: You avoid defeat as long as possible and turn your opponent's fate against them

legendary.description: These are the hardest type of sets to be collected. There are a total of 37 Legendary Sets, 28 of them has their own name and set bonuses usable in fights. Collecting all the items of a Legendary Set will reward the players with coins, 50 gems, 500 shadow energy, 200 stability points in June's Plane, 120 stability points for each item and 120 stability points for a set in Itu's Plane. As of the update 1.34, all legendary sets with bonuses have been improved or saved, and are available to be upgraded at the Forge, together with the Faction Wars.

setInfo.name: Scourge Liquidator
setInfo.ability: You burn your opponent's shadow energy to deal more damage and heal yourself.

setInfo.name: Elders' Lion
setInfo.ability: Avenge the Elders by stunning your opponent with a roar and raining down lightning!

setInfo.name: Warmonger
setInfo.ability: You can enter shadow form faster and it gives you many extra benefits

setInfo.name: Living Legend
setInfo.ability: You're protected by a shield that each 10 seconds absorbs your opponent's attacks with a blast and throws him back when he misses

setInfo.name: Abdicator
setInfo.ability: The Power of Light gives you offensive and defensive abilities and saves you when you receive lethal damage.

setInfo.name: Night Warrior
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Condensing Eraser
setInfo.ability: You use advanced shadow technologies and can paralyze your opponent with electric shock

setInfo.name: Northern Leader
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Wolf Leader
setInfo.ability: You inflict Lacerations, which deal damage to your opponent when they move, and can strengthen this effect by using Horn

setInfo.name: Champion of the Pit
setInfo.ability: You despise ranged weapons, score critical hits frequently and can reduce your opponent's defenses

setInfo.name: Ancient Overlord
setInfo.ability: You perform a Sorrowful Prayer, which allows you to perform powerful area of effect attacks and unleash angry souls on your enemies

setInfo.name: Hand of Magmarion
setInfo.ability: You feed a giant living Fire sword with shadow energy and gain its abilities in battle

setInfo.name: Shadow Colossus
setInfo.ability: Enhance your shadow moves, rain spears on your enemies and shake the earth itself

setInfo.name: Steel Hound
setInfo.ability: Build up Fire energy in Guard phase and unleash a fiery hell on your opponent during Pursuit

setInfo.name: Guardian Dragon
setInfo.ability: Gain more shadow energy from attacks and deal additional shadow damage with weapons

setInfo.name: Arrow
setInfo.ability: Move to get more shadow energy and increase shadow damage

setInfo.name: Golden Demon
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Octopus Of The Damned
setInfo.ability: Stun your opponent by throwing fire orbs and placing mines

setInfo.name: Usurper
setInfo.ability: Break through your opponent's block and deal increased boomerang damage

setInfo.name: Star Chaser
setInfo.ability: After taking lethal damage, you become invulnerable and continue to fight in your enhanced shadow form

setInfo.name: Torturous Nightmare
setInfo.ability: Your attacks inflict Bleeding on your opponent, which damages them and reduce the damage of their next attack

setInfo.name: Celestial Overseer
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Steppe Prince
setInfo.ability: You can summon a pet falcon that helps you in battle

setInfo.name: Dynasty Heritage
setInfo.ability: You use special fire orbs and deal increased damage

setInfo.name: Demon of Wrath
setInfo.ability: You can summon a Death Cage, which strengthens you and prevents your opponent from escaping

setInfo.name: Perfect Surface Servant

setInfo.name: Widow's Favorite
setInfo.ability: The fairest of demons protects you with the power of shadow winds: control them with shadow moves

setInfo.name: King of Serpents

setInfo.name: Gloomy Spectre
setInfo.ability: The more successful and critical attacks you make, the higher your damage will be

setInfo.name: Anomaly Hunter
setInfo.ability: Accumulate shadow energy to deal increased weapon damage and lure enemies into a net of electromines

setInfo.name: Divine Judge
setInfo.ability: You are bound by a special shadow vow to the Void Room and execute its orders, which can strengthen you of weaken your opponent

setInfo.name: Tracker
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Shadow Artisan
setInfo.ability: In battle, you are assisted  by various shadow bot models

setInfo.name: Future Keeper
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Void Warden
setInfo.ability: Contaminate your opponent's shadow energy and summon the mysterious power of Wasteland to your aid

setInfo.name: Predator
setInfo.ability: N/A

setInfo.name: Raven of the Looming Night
setInfo.ability: The Raven of the Looming Night appreciated your skill and gifted you with a special tea recipe and a unique katana technique

setInfo.name: Stranger
setInfo.ability: You can dash toward an enemy, dealing a powerful attack, and are proficient in shadow arts

setInfo.name: Demon Prince
setInfo.ability: Control your opponents and steal their health

setInfo.name: Destroyer of the Epochs
setInfo.ability: Outstanding katana technique, time manipulation, and mastery of traps are available to you

setInfo.name: Chorus of the Void

setInfo.name: Void Anibot
setInfo.ability: Control the Chaos of the Void, but be careful - it knows neither friend nor foe!
